TextView.android:text: This app is the Nice Catch Tiger App. Its mai purpose is to collect data from users in order to make Clemson University safer for students, faculty, and staff. The Department of Research and Safety is making an effort to report "near misses" that could have ended in an accident. Using this information, the DRS will implement measurse if necessary to combat these almost accidents. This app was created by Nick Gratzick, Spencer Provost, and CJ Onyeukwu. Our mentor was Dr. Roy Pargas. Our advisors were Mrs. Bright, and Ms. Kogut.
